channel.title: bbr on Bill World
channel.description: Recent content in bbr on Bill World

item.title: centos7/8开启bbr加速
item.description: 参考博客 https://nodeedge.com/centos8-bbr.html https://cyhour.com/1090/ https://blog.csdn.net/KnYoboy/article/details/104147009 https://loukky.com/archives/479 CentOS 8 默认内核版本为 4.18.x，内核版本高于 4.9 就可以直接开启 BBR，所以 CentOS 8 启用 BBR 非常简单。Vultr VPS CentOS Linux release 8.0.1905 系统测试通过
